verses.verse: God, <WH430> give <WH5414> the king <WH4428> your justice; <WH4941> your righteousness <WH6666> to the royal <WH4428> son. <WH1121>
He will judge <WH1777> your people <WH5971> with righteousness, <WH6664> and your poor <WH6041> with justice. <WH4941>
The mountains <WH2022> shall bring <WH5375> prosperity <WH7965> to the people. <WH5971> The hills <WH1389> bring the fruit of righteousness. <WH6666>
He will judge <WH8199> the poor <WH6041> of the people. <WH5971> He will save <WH3467> the children <WH1121> of the needy, <WH34> and will break the oppressor <WH6231> in pieces. <WH1792>
They shall fear <WH3372> you while <WH5973> the sun <WH8121> endures; <WH6440> and as long as the moon, <WH3394> throughout all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
He will come down <WH3381> like rain <WH4306> on the mown <WH1488> grass, <WH7241> as showers that water <WH2222> the earth. <WH776>
In his days, <WH3117> the righteous <WH6662> shall flourish, <WH6524> and abundance <WH7230> of peace, <WH7965> until the moon is no more. <WH3394>
He shall have dominion <WH7287> also from sea <WH3220> to sea, <WH3220> from the River <WH5104> to the ends <WH657> of the earth. <WH776>
Those who dwell in the wilderness <WH6728> shall bow <WH3766> before <WH6440> him. <WH341> His enemies shall lick <WH3897> the dust. <WH6083>
The kings <WH4428> of Tarshish <WH8659> and of the islands <WH339> will bring <WH7725> tribute. <WH4503> The kings <WH4428> of Sheba <WH7614> and Seba <WH5434> shall offer <WH7126> gifts. <WH814>
Yes, <WH4428> all kings shall fall down <WH7812> before him. <WH1471> All nations shall serve him. <WH5647>
For he will deliver <WH5337> the needy <WH34> when he cries; <WH7768> the poor, <WH6041> who has no helper. <WH5826>
He will have pity <WH2347> on the poor <WH1800> and needy. <WH1800> He will save <WH3467> the souls <WH5315> of the needy. <WH34>
He will redeem <WH1350> their soul <WH5315> from oppression <WH8496> and violence. <WH2555> Their blood <WH1818> will be precious <WH3365> in his sight. <WH5869>

They shall live, <WH2421> and to him shall be given <WH5414> of the gold <WH2091> of Sheba. <WH7614> Men shall pray <WH6419> for him continually. <WH8548> They shall bless <WH1288> him all day long. <WH3117>

Abundance <WH6451> of grain <WH1250> shall be throughout the land. <WH776> <WH7218> Its <WH2022> fruit <WH6529> sways <WH7493> like Lebanon. <WH3844> Let it <WH5892> flourish, <WH6692> thriving like the grass <WH6212> of the field. <WH776>

His name <WH8034> endures forever. <WH5769> His name <WH8034> continues <WH5125> as long as <WH6440> the sun. <WH8121> Men shall be blessed <WH1288> by him. <WH1471> All nations will call him blessed. <WH833>
Praise <WH1288> be to Yahweh <WH3068> God, <WH430> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> who alone does <WH6213> marvelous deeds. <WH6381>
Blessed <WH1288> be his glorious <WH3519> name <WH8034> forever! <WH5769> Let the whole earth <WH776> be filled <WH4390> with his glory! <WH3519> Amen <WH543> and amen. <WH543>
This ends <WH3615> the prayers <WH8605> by David, <WH1732> the son <WH1121> of Jesse. <WH3448>
